mods.name: Ability Storm
mods.author: unluckycrafter
mods.description: Ability Storm is a mod made by Unluckycrafter that spawns ability orbs at random positions. It also randomly picks which slot to put the ability orb into.

mods.name: Bigger Black Holes
mods.author: AbstractMelon
mods.description: Makes black hole have way too much power and instantly grow to max size and instakill everyone

mods.name: Map Selector
mods.author: AbstractMelon and Mathlover3
mods.description:
Allows you to select your own maps! Only the host has to use the mod and the mod will only work if the host is using it. TO BECOME THE HOST, BE THE PLAYER EVERYONE JOINS! Website for map idâ€™s here: https://abstractmelon.github.io/MapPicker/website/index.html

If you do the same map twice the game can lag

mods.name: Any Color
mods.author: David
mods.description: Allows you to steal a color if you are the host. note it only works if you are host

mods.name: Arrow Circle
mods.author: Breh
mods.description: It's a modified version of Wackymoder's
were the arrows get shot around you in a circle instead of a line

mods.name: Guns Mod
mods.author: ShAdowDev16
mods.description:
Yes, I think you have all been waiting for this...
GUNS
Also you can create your own guns (documentation on GitHub)

mods.name: Infinite Platform Size
mods.author: Diggity
mods.description: Infinite Platfromability Size, removes the limit of how big your platform can be.

mods.name: Instant Cooldowns
mods.author: AbstractMelon
mods.description: Makes abilities have 1/3 of the cooldown they normally have. Fixed incompatiblities :)

mods.name: No Spike Disappear
mods.author: R4aina
mods.description: Previous spikes dont disappear after placing new one

mods.name: Same Color
mods.author: David
mods.description: if you are the host and have this mod then everyone will become the same color as you when the game starts. nice if someone is targeting someone or you just want people to get confused who they are

mods.name: Spectator Mode
mods.author: Diggity
mods.description: Press 1 on your keyboard to enter spectator mode!

mods.name: Time Stop Timer
mods.author: Antimality
mods.description: Shows a timer displaying how long it takes until the time freezes or unfreezes
